name: Reward of Grace
text: When you lay on hands, divine energy ripples through you, granting you grace.
benefit: Each time you use your lay on hands ability, you gain a +1 sacred bonus on all attack rolls for 1 round.
text_zh: 当你使用圣疗时，神圣的力量环绕于你，以此赞许你的善行。
benefit_zh: 每次你使用【圣疗】能力时，你在所有攻击骰上获得+1圣神加值，持续1轮。
